00036 // The following Many-Body Operators have to initialized with
00037 // int dim and FormfactorPara par before use
00038 
00039 char* fflabel[NMULTIPOLES] = { "EMonopole", 
00040                                "EDipole", 
00041                                "EQuadrupole", 
00042                                "EOctupole" };
00043 
00044 // Array of Multipole Formfactor Operators
00045 ManyBodyOperator OpMultipoleFormfactor[NMULTIPOLES];
00046 
00047 
00048 ManyBodyOperators OpMultipoleFormfactors = {
00049  n : NMULTIPOLES,
00050  Op : OpMultipoleFormfactor,
00051  me : calcMultipoleFormfactorsod
00052 };

00054 
00055 void initOpFormfactors(FormfactorPara* par)
00056 {
00057   int i;
00058 
00059   OpMultipoleFormfactors.dim = 2*par->npoints;
00060   OpMultipoleFormfactors.size = 2*par->npoints;
00061   OpMultipoleFormfactors.par = par;
00062 
00063   for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++) {
00064     char* name = malloc(60);
00065     sprintf(name, "%sFormfactors-%05.2f-%d-%d-%d%s",
00066             fflabel[i],
00067             par->qmax, par->npoints, par->nalpha, par->ncosb, 
00068             par->recoil ? "-recoil" : "");
00069     OpMultipoleFormfactor[i].name = name;
00070     OpMultipoleFormfactor[i].rank = 2*i;
00071     OpMultipoleFormfactor[i].pi = i % 2;
00072     OpMultipoleFormfactor[i].dim = 2*par->npoints;
00073     OpMultipoleFormfactor[i].size = 2*par->npoints;
00074     OpMultipoleFormfactor[i].par = par;
00075     OpMultipoleFormfactor[i].me = NULL;
00076   }
00077 }

00079 
00080 // static SlaterDet and SlaterDetAux workspace
00081 static SlaterDet* Qboost;
00082 static SlaterDetAux* Xboost;
00083 
00084 static void ob_formfactorq(double q[3],
00085                            const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00086                            const GaussianAux* X, complex double ffactor[2])
00087 {
00088   complex double f;
00089 
00090   f = X->R*X->S* cexp(I*(X->rho[0]*q[0]+X->rho[1]*q[1]+X->rho[2]*q[2]) - 
00091                       0.5*X->alpha*(SQR(q[0])+SQR(q[1])+SQR(q[2])));
00092 
00093   if (G1->xi == 1)
00094     ffactor[0] += f* X->T;
00095   if (G1->xi == -1)
00096     ffactor[1] += f* X->T;
00097 }
00098   
00099 
00100 // calculate off-diagonal proton and neutron point formfactor F(q)
00101 void calcFormfactorod(double q[3], int recoil,
00102                       const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00103                       const SlaterDetAux* X,
00104                       complex double ffactor[2])
00105 {
00106   // inititialize workspace if necessary
00107   if (recoil && !Qboost) {
00108     Qboost = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00109     initSlaterDet(Qp, Qboost);
00110     Xboost = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00111     initSlaterDetAux(Qp, Xboost);
00112   }
00113 
00114   OneBodyOperator op_ob_formfactorq = {dim: 2, opt: 1, par: q,
00115                                        me : ob_formfactorq};
00116 
00117   if (recoil) { 
00118     double mass = Q->Z*mproton+Q->N*mneutron;
00119     double Vcm[3] = {-q[0]/mass, -q[1]/mass, -q[2]/mass};
00120 
00121     copySlaterDet(Qp, Qboost);
00122     boostSlaterDet(Qboost, Vcm);
00123     calcSlaterDetAuxod(Q, Qboost, Xboost);
00124     calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qboost, Xboost, &op_ob_formfactorq, ffactor);
00125   } else 
00126     calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_formfactorq, ffactor);
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 int il[NMULTIPOLES] = {0, 1, 4, 9};
00131 int diml[NMULTIPOLES] = {1, 3, 5, 7};
00132 
00133 void calcMultipoleFormfactorsod(FormfactorPara* par,
00134                                 const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00135                                 const SlaterDetAux* X,
00136                                 complex double* ffactor)
00137 {
00138   double qmax = par->qmax;
00139   int ialpha, nalpha = par->nalpha;
00140   int icosb, ncosb = par->ncosb;
00141   int npoints = par->npoints;
00142   int recoil = par->recoil;
00143   int m, i, t, l;
00144   double alpha, beta, weight;
00145   double q, k[3];
00146   complex double ff[2];
00147 
00148   for (l=0; l<NMULTIPOLES; l++)
00149     for (t=0; t<2; t++)
00150       for (i=0; i<npoints; i++)
00151         for (m=0; m<diml[l]; m++)
00152           ffactor[m + i*diml[l] + t*diml[l]*npoints + il[l]*2*npoints] = 0.0;
00153 
00154   double alphal[nalpha], walphal[nalpha];
00155   double cosbl[ncosb], wcosbl[ncosb];
00156   
00157   ShiftedPeriodicTrapezoidalPoints(nalpha, 0, 2*M_PI, 0.0, alphal, walphal);
00158   GaussLegendrePoints(ncosb, -1, 1, cosbl, wcosbl); 
00159 
00160   for (i=0; i<npoints; i++) {
00161     q = qmax* i/(npoints-1);
00162     for (ialpha=0; ialpha<nalpha; ialpha++)
00163       for (icosb=0; icosb<ncosb; icosb++) {
00164         alpha = alphal[ialpha];
00165         beta = acos(cosbl[icosb]);
00166         weight = walphal[ialpha]*wcosbl[icosb];
00167 
00168         k[0] = q*cos(alpha)*sin(beta);
00169         k[1] = q*sin(alpha)*sin(beta);
00170         k[2] = q*cos(beta);
00171 
00172         calcFormfactorod(k, recoil, Q, Qp, X, ff);
00173         for (l=0; l<NMULTIPOLES; l++)
00174           for (t=0; t<2; t++)
00175             for (m=-l; m<=l; m++)
00176               ffactor[m+l + i*diml[l] + t*diml[l]*npoints + il[l]*2*npoints] += 
00177                 weight* ff[t]* Y(2*l,2*m,beta,alpha);
00178         }
00179     }
00180 }

00183 // outpout routines
00184 
00185 // Formfactors are saved as F(q) and not as |F(q)|^2 !
00186 
00187 void writePointFormfactors(FILE* fp,
00188                            const Projection* P,
00189                            const FormfactorPara* p,
00190                            int l,
00191                            int j, int pi, int a,
00192                            void* ffactorme,
00193                            const Eigenstates* E)
00194 {
00195   int jmax = P->jmax;
00196   int ipj = idxpij(jmax,pi,j);
00197   int npoints = p->npoints;
00198   double qmax = p->qmax;
00199   int idx = E->index[ipj][a];
00200   complex double norm = E->norm[ipj][idx];
00201   complex double (**ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00202   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = ffctme[ipj][idx];
00203   int i;
00204   double q, ml, mlp, mln;
00205   
00206   for (i=0; i<npoints; i++) {
00207     q = qmax*i/(npoints-1);
00208     mlp = ff[0][i]/norm;
00209     mln = ff[1][i]/norm;
00210     ml = (ff[0][i]+ff[1][i])/norm;
00211 
00212     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%13.8g\t%13.8g\t%13.8g\n",
00213             q,
00214             sqrt(j+1.0)*ml,
00215             sqrt(j+1.0)*mlp,
00216             sqrt(j+1.0)*mln);
00217   }
00218 }

00221 void writeChargeFormfactors(FILE* fp,
00222                             const Projection* P,
00223                             const FormfactorPara* p,
00224                             int l,
00225                             int j, int pi, int a,
00226                             void* ffactorme,
00227                             const Eigenstates* E)
00228 {
00229   int jmax = P->jmax;
00230   int ipj = idxpij(jmax,pi,j);
00231   int npoints = p->npoints;
00232   double qmax = p->qmax;
00233   int idx = E->index[ipj][a];
00234   double norm = E->norm[ipj][idx];
00235   complex double (**ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00236   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = ffctme[ipj][idx];
00237   int i;
00238   double q;
00239   double ml;
00240   
00241   for (i=0; i<npoints; i++) {
00242     q = qmax*i/(npoints-1);
00243     
00244     ml = creal((ff[0][i]*fproton(q) + ff[1][i]*fneutron(q))/norm);    
00245 
00246     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%13.5g\n", q, sqrt(j+1.0)*ml);
00247   }
00248 }

00250 
00251 void writeTransitionPointFormfactors(FILE* fp,
00252                                      const Projection* P,
00253                                      const FormfactorPara* p,
00254                                      int l,
00255                                      int jfin, int pfin, int afin,
00256                                      int jini, int pini, int aini,
00257                                      void* ffactorme,
00258                                      const Eigenstates* E)
00259 {
00260   int jmax = P->jmax;
00261   int ipjfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00262   int ipjini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00263   int npoints = p->npoints;
00264   double qmax = p->qmax;
00265   int idxfin = E->index[ipjfin][afin];
00266   int idxini = E->index[ipjini][aini];
00267   double normfin = E->norm[ipjfin][idxfin];
00268   double normini = E->norm[ipjini][idxini];
00269   complex double (****ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00270   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = 
00271     ffctme[ipjfin][ipjini][idxfin][idxini];
00272   int i;
00273   double q;
00274   double mlp, mln, ml;
00275   complex double ff0p, ff0n, phase;
00276   
00277   // get rid of possible phase factors
00278   // formfactor should be real and positive for q=0
00279   
00280   int ifix=npoints/3;
00281 
00282   // average over proton and neutron phasese (is this correct ?)
00283   ff0p = ff[0][ifix]; ff0n = ff[1][ifix];
00284   phase = 0.5*(ff0p/cabs(ff0p)+ff0n/cabs(ff0n));
00285 
00286   for (i=0; i<npoints; i++) {
00287     q = qmax*i/(npoints-1);
00288 
00289     mlp = creal(ff[0][i]/phase)/sqrt(normfin*normini);
00290     mln = creal(ff[1][i]/phase)/sqrt(normfin*normini);
00291     ml = creal((ff[0][i]+ff[1][i])/phase)/sqrt(normfin*normini);
00292 
00293     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%13.8g\t%13.8g\t%13.8g\n",
00294             q,
00295             sqrt(jfin+1.0)*ml,
00296             sqrt(jfin+1.0)*mlp,
00297             sqrt(jfin+1.0)*mln);
00298   }
00299 }

00301 
00302 void writeTransitionChargeFormfactors(FILE* fp,
00303                                       const Projection* P,
00304                                       const FormfactorPara* p,
00305                                       int l,
00306                                       int jfin, int pfin, int afin,
00307                                       int jini, int pini, int aini,
00308                                       void* ffactorme,
00309                                       const Eigenstates* E)
00310 {
00311   int jmax = P->jmax;
00312   int ipjfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00313   int ipjini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00314   int npoints = p->npoints;
00315   double qmax = p->qmax;
00316   int idxfin = E->index[ipjfin][afin];
00317   int idxini = E->index[ipjini][aini];
00318   double normfin = E->norm[ipjfin][idxfin];
00319   double normini = E->norm[ipjini][idxini];
00320   complex double (****ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00321   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = 
00322     ffctme[ipjfin][ipjini][idxfin][idxini];
00323   int i;
00324   double q;
00325   double ml;
00326   complex double ff0, phase;
00327   
00328   // get rid of possible phase factors
00329   // formfactor should be real and positive for q=0
00330   
00331   int ifix=npoints/3;
00332   double qfix=qmax*ifix/(npoints-1);
00333 
00334   ff0 = ff[0][ifix]*fproton(qfix)+ff[1][ifix]*fneutron(qfix);
00335   phase = ff0/cabs(ff0);
00336 
00337   for (i=0; i<npoints; i++) {
00338     q = qmax*i/(npoints-1);
00339     
00340     ml = creal((ff[0][i]*fproton(q) + ff[1][i]*fneutron(q))/phase)/
00341       sqrt(normfin*normini);
00342 
00343     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%13.5g\n", q, sqrt(jfin+1)*ml);
00344   }
00345 }

00347 
00348 void writePointDensities(FILE* fp,
00349                          const Projection* P,
00350                          const FormfactorPara* p,
00351                          double rmax, int npointsr,
00352                          int A, int l,
00353                          int j, int pi, int a,
00354                          void* ffactorme,
00355                          const Eigenstates* E)
00356 {
00357   int jmax = P->jmax;
00358   int ipj = idxpij(jmax,pi,j);
00359   int npoints = p->npoints;
00360   double qmax = p->qmax;
00361   int idx = E->index[ipj][a];
00362   complex double norm = E->norm[ipj][idx];
00363   complex double (**ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00364   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = ffctme[ipj][idx];
00365   complex double anu[npoints][2];
00366 
00367   int i, nu;
00368   double qnu[npoints];
00369   double Rc = M_PI*(npoints-1)/qmax;
00370 
00371   if (l != 0) {
00372     fprintf(stderr, "writePointDensities not yet implemented for l != 0\n");
00373     exit(-1);
00374   }
00375 
00376   // calculate coefficients anu
00377   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++) {
00378     qnu[nu] = M_PI*nu/Rc;
00379     anu[nu][0] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*ff[0][nu]/norm;
00380     anu[nu][1] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*ff[1][nu]/norm;
00381   }
00382 
00383   // calculate densities 
00384       
00385   double deltar=rmax/(npointsr-1);
00386   double rho, rhop, rhon;
00387 
00388   for (i=0; i<npointsr; i++) {
00389 
00390     rho = 0.0; 
00391     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00392       rho += (anu[nu][0]+anu[nu][1])*besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00393 
00394     rhop = 0.0;
00395     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00396       rhop += anu[nu][0]* besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00397 
00398     rhon = 0.0;
00399     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00400       rhon += anu[nu][1]* besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00401 
00402     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%15.8g\t%15.8g\t%15.8g\n", 
00403             i*deltar, rho, rhop, rhon);
00404   }
00405 }

00408 // use proton charge form factor to smear out protons and neutrons
00409 
00410 void writeMatterDensities(FILE* fp,
00411                           const Projection* P,
00412                           const FormfactorPara* p,
00413                           double rmax, int npointsr,
00414                           int A, int l,
00415                           int j, int pi, int a,
00416                           void* ffactorme,
00417                           const Eigenstates* E)
00418 {
00419   int jmax = P->jmax;
00420   int ipj = idxpij(jmax,pi,j);
00421   int npoints = p->npoints;
00422   double qmax = p->qmax;
00423   int idx = E->index[ipj][a];
00424   complex double norm = E->norm[ipj][idx];
00425   complex double (**ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00426   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = ffctme[ipj][idx];
00427   complex double anu[npoints][2];
00428 
00429   int i, nu;
00430   double qnu[npoints];
00431   double Rc = M_PI*(npoints-1)/qmax;
00432 
00433   if (l != 0) {
00434     fprintf(stderr, "writeMatterDensities not yet implemented for l != 0\n");
00435     exit(-1);
00436   }
00437 
00438   // calculate coefficients anu
00439   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++) {
00440     qnu[nu] = M_PI*nu/Rc;
00441     anu[nu][0] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*ff[0][nu]*fproton(qnu[nu])/norm;
00442     anu[nu][1] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*ff[1][nu]*fproton(qnu[nu])/norm;
00443   }
00444 
00445   // calculate densities 
00446       
00447   double deltar=rmax/(npointsr-1);
00448   double rho, rhop, rhon;
00449 
00450   for (i=0; i<npointsr; i++) {
00451 
00452     rho = 0.0; 
00453     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00454       rho += (anu[nu][0]+anu[nu][1])*besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00455 
00456     rhop = 0.0;
00457     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00458       rhop += anu[nu][0]* besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00459 
00460     rhon = 0.0;
00461     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00462       rhon += anu[nu][1]* besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00463 
00464     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%15.8g\t%15.8g\t%15.8g\n", 
00465             i*deltar, rho, rhop, rhon);
00466   }
00467 }

00469 
00470 void writeChargeDensities(FILE* fp,
00471                           const Projection* P,
00472                           const FormfactorPara* p,
00473                           double rmax, int npointsr,
00474                           int Z, int l,
00475                           int j, int pi, int a,
00476                           void* ffactorme,
00477                           const Eigenstates* E)
00478 {
00479   int jmax = P->jmax;
00480   int ipj = idxpij(jmax,pi,j);
00481   int npoints = p->npoints;
00482   double qmax = p->qmax;
00483   int idx = E->index[ipj][a];
00484   complex double norm = E->norm[ipj][idx];
00485   complex double (**ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00486   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = ffctme[ipj][idx];
00487   double anu[npoints];
00488 
00489   int i, nu;
00490   double qnu[npoints];
00491   double Rc = M_PI*(npoints-1)/qmax;
00492 
00493   if (l != 0) {
00494     fprintf(stderr, "writeChargeDensities not yet implemented for l != 0\n");
00495     exit(-1);
00496   }
00497 
00498   // calculate coefficients anu
00499   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++) {
00500     qnu[nu] = M_PI*nu/Rc;
00501     anu[nu] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*
00502       (ff[0][nu]*fproton(qnu[nu])+ff[1][nu]*fneutron(qnu[nu]))/norm;
00503   }
00504 
00505   // calculate densities 
00506       
00507   double deltar=rmax/(npointsr-1);
00508   double rho;
00509 
00510   // charge densities
00511   for (i=0; i<npointsr; i++) {
00512     rho = 0.0; 
00513     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00514       rho += anu[nu]*besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00515     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%15.8g\n", i*deltar, rho);
00516   }
00517 }

00520 void writeChargeFourierBessel(FILE* fp,
00521                               const Projection* P,
00522                               const FormfactorPara* p,
00523                               double rmax, int npointsr,
00524                               int Z, int l,
00525                               int j, int pi, int a,
00526                               void* ffactorme,
00527                               const Eigenstates* E)
00528 {
00529   int jmax = P->jmax;
00530   int ipj = idxpij(jmax,pi,j);
00531   int npoints = p->npoints;
00532   double qmax = p->qmax;
00533   int idx = E->index[ipj][a];
00534   complex double norm = E->norm[ipj][idx];
00535   complex double (**ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00536   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = ffctme[ipj][idx];
00537   double anu[npoints];
00538 
00539   int nu;
00540   double qnu[npoints];
00541   double Rc = M_PI*(npoints-1)/qmax;
00542 
00543   if (l != 0) {
00544     fprintf(stderr, "writeChargeFourierBessel not yet implemented for l != 0\n");
00545     exit(-1);
00546   }
00547 
00548   // calculate coefficients anu
00549   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++) {
00550     qnu[nu] = M_PI*nu/Rc;
00551     anu[nu] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*
00552       (ff[0][nu]*fproton(qnu[nu])+ff[1][nu]*fneutron(qnu[nu]))/norm;
00553   }
00554 
00555   // write fourier bessel coefficients
00556 
00557   fprintf(fp, "# Rc      = %8.3f\n", Rc);
00558   fprintf(fp, "# qmax    = %8.3f\n", qmax);
00559   fprintf(fp, "# npoints = %d\n", npoints-1);
00560 
00561   fprintf(fp, "\n#nu\tq[nu]\ta[nu]\n");
00562 
00563   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00564     fprintf(fp, "%d\t%8.3f\t%15.8g\n", nu, qnu[nu], anu[nu]);
00565 
00566 }

00569 void writeTransitionPointDensities(FILE* fp,
00570                                    const Projection* P,
00571                                    const FormfactorPara* p,
00572                                    double rmax, int npointsr,
00573                                    int A, int l,
00574                                    int jfin, int pfin, int afin,
00575                                    int jini, int pini, int aini,
00576                                    void* ffactorme,
00577                                    const Eigenstates* E)
00578 {
00579   int jmax = P->jmax;
00580   int ipjini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00581   int ipjfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00582   int npoints = p->npoints;
00583   double qmax = p->qmax;
00584   int idxfin = E->index[ipjfin][afin];
00585   int idxini = E->index[ipjini][aini];
00586   double normfin = E->norm[ipjfin][idxfin];
00587   double normini = E->norm[ipjini][idxini];
00588   complex double (****ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00589   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = 
00590     ffctme[ipjfin][ipjini][idxfin][idxini];
00591   complex double anu[npoints][2];
00592 
00593   int i, nu;
00594   complex double ff0, phase;
00595   double qnu[npoints];
00596   double Rc = M_PI*(npoints-1)/qmax;
00597 
00598   if (l != 0) {
00599     fprintf(stderr, "writeTransitionPointDensities not yet implemented for l != 0\n");
00600     exit(-1);
00601   }
00602 
00603   // get rid of possible phase factor
00604 
00605   int ifix=npoints/3;
00606   double qfix=qmax*ifix/(npoints-1);
00607 
00608   ff0 = ff[0][ifix]*fproton(qfix)+ff[1][ifix]*fneutron(qfix);
00609   phase = ff0/cabs(ff0);
00610 
00611   // calculate coefficients anu
00612   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++) {
00613     qnu[nu] = M_PI*nu/Rc;
00614     anu[nu][0] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*
00615       creal(ff[0][nu]/phase)/sqrt(normfin*normini);
00616     anu[nu][1] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*
00617       creal(ff[1][nu]/phase)/sqrt(normfin*normini);
00618   }
00619 
00620   // calculate densities 
00621       
00622   double deltar=rmax/(npointsr-1);
00623   double rho, rhop, rhon;
00624 
00625   for (i=0; i<npointsr; i++) {
00626 
00627     rho = 0.0; 
00628     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00629       rho += (anu[nu][0]+anu[nu][1])*besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00630 
00631     rhop = 0.0; 
00632     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00633       rhop += anu[nu][0]*besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00634 
00635     rhon = 0.0; 
00636     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00637       rhon += anu[nu][1]*besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00638 
00639     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%15.8g\t%15.8g\t%15.8g\n", 
00640             i*deltar, rho, rhop, rhon);
00641   }
00642 }

00645 void writeTransitionChargeDensities(FILE* fp,
00646                                     const Projection* P,
00647                                     const FormfactorPara* p,
00648                                     double rmax, int npointsr,
00649                                     int Z, int l,
00650                                     int jfin, int pfin, int afin,
00651                                     int jini, int pini, int aini,
00652                                     void* ffactorme,
00653                                     const Eigenstates* E)
00654 {
00655   int jmax = P->jmax;
00656   int ipjini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00657   int ipjfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00658   int npoints = p->npoints;
00659   double qmax = p->qmax;
00660   int idxfin = E->index[ipjfin][afin];
00661   int idxini = E->index[ipjini][aini];
00662   double normfin = E->norm[ipjfin][idxfin];
00663   double normini = E->norm[ipjini][idxini];
00664   complex double (****ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00665   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = 
00666     ffctme[ipjfin][ipjini][idxfin][idxini];
00667   complex double anu[npoints];
00668 
00669   int i, nu;
00670   complex double ff0, phase;
00671   double qnu[npoints];
00672   double Rc = M_PI*(npoints-1)/qmax;
00673 
00674   if (l != 0) {
00675     fprintf(stderr, "writeChargeDensities not yet implemented for l != 0\n");
00676     exit(-1);
00677   }
00678 
00679   // get rid of possible phase factor
00680 
00681   int ifix=npoints/3;
00682   double qfix=qmax*ifix/(npoints-1);
00683 
00684   ff0 = ff[0][ifix]*fproton(qfix)+ff[1][ifix]*fneutron(qfix);
00685   phase = ff0/cabs(ff0);
00686 
00687   // calculate coefficients anu
00688   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++) {
00689     qnu[nu] = M_PI*nu/Rc;
00690     anu[nu] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*
00691       creal((ff[0][nu]*fproton(qnu[nu])+ff[1][nu]*fneutron(qnu[nu]))/phase)/
00692       sqrt(normfin*normini);
00693   }
00694 
00695   // calculate densities 
00696       
00697   double deltar=rmax/(npointsr-1);
00698   double rho;
00699 
00700   // charge densities
00701   for (i=0; i<npointsr; i++) {
00702     rho = 0.0; 
00703     for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00704       rho += anu[nu]*besselj0(qnu[nu]*i*deltar);
00705 
00706     fprintf(fp, "%6.3f\t%15.8g\n", i*deltar, rho);
00707   }
00708 }

00711 void writeTransitionChargeFourierBessel(FILE* fp,
00712                                         const Projection* P,
00713                                         const FormfactorPara* p,
00714                                         double rmax, int npointsr,
00715                                         int Z, int l,
00716                                         int jfin, int pfin, int afin,
00717                                         int jini, int pini, int aini,
00718                                         void* ffactorme,
00719                                         const Eigenstates* E)
00720 {
00721   int jmax = P->jmax;
00722   int ipjini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00723   int ipjfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00724   int npoints = p->npoints;
00725   double qmax = p->qmax;
00726   int idxfin = E->index[ipjfin][afin];
00727   int idxini = E->index[ipjini][aini];
00728   double normfin = E->norm[ipjfin][idxfin];
00729   double normini = E->norm[ipjini][idxini];
00730   complex double (****ffctme)[2*npoints] = ffactorme;
00731   complex double (*ff)[npoints] = 
00732     ffctme[ipjfin][ipjini][idxfin][idxini];
00733   double anu[npoints];
00734 
00735   int nu;
00736   complex double ff0, phase;
00737   double qnu[npoints];
00738   double Rc = M_PI*(npoints-1)/qmax;
00739 
00740   if (l != 0) {
00741     fprintf(stderr, "writeChargeDensities not yet implemented for l != 0\n");
00742     exit(-1);
00743   }
00744 
00745   // get rid of possible phase factor
00746 
00747   int ifix=npoints/3;
00748   double qfix=qmax*ifix/(npoints-1);
00749 
00750   ff0 = ff[0][ifix]*fproton(qfix)+ff[1][ifix]*fneutron(qfix);
00751   phase = ff0/cabs(ff0);
00752 
00753   // calculate coefficients anu
00754   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++) {
00755     qnu[nu] = M_PI*nu/Rc;
00756     anu[nu] = 1/sqrt(4*M_PI)*SQR(qnu[nu])/(2*M_PI*Rc)*
00757       creal((ff[0][nu]*fproton(qnu[nu])+ff[1][nu]*fneutron(qnu[nu]))/phase)/
00758       sqrt(normfin*normini);
00759   }
00760 
00761   // write fourier bessel coefficients
00762 
00763   fprintf(fp, "# Rc      = %8.3f\n", Rc);
00764   fprintf(fp, "# qmax    = %8.3f\n", qmax);
00765   fprintf(fp, "# npoints = %d\n", npoints-1);
00766 
00767   fprintf(fp, "\n#nu\tq[nu]\ta[nu]\n");
00768 
00769   for (nu=1; nu<npoints; nu++)
00770     fprintf(fp, "%d\t%8.3f\t%15.8g\n", nu, qnu[nu], anu[nu]);
00771 
00772 }
